hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #7# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Compass#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the Groose is loose.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a Bomb Bag# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Volvagia#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Second Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #riding the bean in Lake Hylia# leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Bow#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Zora Scale# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple First Mirror Right Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Magic Meter#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Forest Temple#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Nocturne of Shadow# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 1 Bottom

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Hookshot#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #4# major items.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Fairy).text: Ganondorf doesn't specialize in hiding items, nor in keeping secrets for that matter.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Deku Stick#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Water Temple Compass#.
